titleStmt.title: TEI P5 encoded version of sample(s) of "STATYSTYCZNE SYSTEMY EKSPERTOWE"

bibl.title: STATYSTYCZNE SYSTEMY EKSPERTOWE
bibl.author: Praca zbiorowa pod redakcją Czesława Domańskiego

revisionDesc.change: Creation of text.xml from the corresponding pre_text.xml, by sampling.
Creation of header.xml based on the original header and text.xml, validation.

Manual correction in segmentation (segm_7510.524200, segm_7510.524197, segm_7510.524202) and morphosyntax (morph_7510.524200, morph_7510.524197, morph_7510.524202). Three instances of the same error, e.g. "-0.3" was "-0." in segmentation and "0.3" in morphosyntax.
